text: mariyu memu'tur parvatanni etti mipai nilipi mi nunci tisukunna pramananni (jnapakam cesukondi): "Memu miku cestunna vatini (upadesalanu) sthiranga patincandi mariyu jagrattaga vinandi." Ani ceppamu. Varu: "Memu vinnamu kani atikramistunnamu." Ani annaru, vari satyatiraskaram valana vari hrdayalalo avududa prema nindi poyindi. Varito anu: "Miru visvasule ayite! I cedu cestalanu ceyamani mim'malni adesince mi i visvasam cala ceddadi
